sentences.en: " Well, it was really very enjoyable . Turned out much better than I expected. "
sentences.cn: " 噢, 戏演得很有味,比我原来估计的要好多了. ”

sentences.en: Games can make learning more enjoyable.
He, like others, yearned for the enjoyment of whatever he saw enjoyable.
sentences.cn: 他象别人那样, 渴望欣赏不论什么他看到的可以欣赏的东西.

sentences.en: It is always important to choose enjoyable, nutritious foods.
sentences.cn: 选择好吃的、营养价值高的食物总是很重要。

sentences.en: It was much more enjoyable than I had expected.
sentences.cn: 这比我预期的有趣得多。

sentences.en: Skipping is one of the most enjoyable aerobic activities.
sentences.cn: 跳绳是最有乐趣的有氧健身运动之一。

sentences.en: The book is an enjoyable and undemanding read.
sentences.cn: 该书妙趣横生轻松易读。
这本书里都是些饶有趣味的闲谈瞎扯。

sentences.en: The exhibition is an enjoyable and, ultimately, life-affirming experience.
sentences.cn: 这个展览是一次不但令人愉快，而且还鼓舞人心的体验。

sentences.en: The pace of the book is leisurely, with enjoyable literary and historical asides.
sentences.cn: 这本书节奏明快，另外还穿插了一些趣味盎然的文史掌故。

sentences.en: The staff should make sure the kids have an enjoyable and educational day.
sentences.cn: 老师们应该确保孩子们度过愉快而有教育意义的一天。

sentences.en: The two days we spent there were enjoyable but hectic.
sentences.cn: 我们在那里度过的两天愉快但忙乱。

sentences.en: The whole holiday was really enjoyable, from start to finish.
sentences.cn: 整个假期自始至终都很好,玩得很愉快.

sentences.en: What a book can do, and what this one will try to accomplish, is to present examples of how life can be made more enjoyable.
sentences.cn: 一本书能做到的，也是本书努力实现的，就是列举一些例子说明如何让生活变得更加愉快。

sentences.en: What was specially enjoyable about that job?
sentences.cn: 那份工作有什么特别有趣之处？

sentences.en: With the arrival of John's friends, the party became really enjoyable.
sentences.cn: 随着约翰朋友的到来, 聚会变得真正好玩起来.

words.tran_cn: 愉快地；有趣地；可享乐地
欣赏，享受；喜爱；使过得快活
